    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET ä½¿ç”¨ DocNET åº“å¿«é€Ÿé«˜æ•ˆçš„æ“ä½œ PDF æ–‡æ¡£</span>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å‰è¨€</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>PDF æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œä½œä¸ºæ—¥å¸¸å·¥ä½œä¸­ä¸å¯æˆ–ç¼ºçš„æ–‡æ¡£æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºå„ç±»åœºæ™¯ã€‚ä»Šå¤©æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥è®²è®²åœ¨ .NET ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ DocNET åº“å¿«é€Ÿé«˜æ•ˆçš„æ“ä½œ PDF æ–‡æ¡£ã€‚</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®ä»‹ç»</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>DocNET æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº .NET å¼€æºï¼ˆMIT licenseï¼‰ã€è·¨å¹³å°ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒWindowsã€Linuxå’ŒmacOSå¹³å°ï¼‰çš„æ—¨åœ¨æä¾›å¿«é€Ÿ PDF ç¼–è¾‘å’Œæ•°æ®æå–çš„æ“ä½œåº“ã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯åŸºäº Chromium æ‰€ä½¿ç”¨çš„ PDFium C++ åº“å¼€å‘çš„ .NET Standard 2.0 å°è£…åº“ã€‚</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®ç‰¹æ€§</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>PDF æå–åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæ”¯æŒ PDF ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€é¡µæ•°ã€é¡µé¢å®½åº¦ã€é¡µé¢é«˜åº¦ã€é¡µé¢æ–‡æœ¬ã€å­—ç¬¦å­—ä½“å¤§å°ç­‰ç›¸å…³PDFä¿¡æ¯æå–ã€‚</span></li>
<li><span>PDF ç¼–è¾‘åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š æ”¯æŒåˆ†å‰² PDF æ–‡æ¡£ã€åˆå¹¶ PDF æ–‡æ¡£ã€è§£é” PDF æ–‡æ¡£ã€‚</span></li>
<li><span>æ”¯æŒæ¸²æŸ“é¡µé¢ä¸ºå›¾åƒã€JPEG å›¾ç‰‡è½¬æ¢ä¸º PDF æ–‡ä»¶ç­‰ç­‰ã€‚</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®æºä»£ç </span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015648419-644776483.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>åˆ›å»ºDocNETExercisesæ§åˆ¶å°åº”ç”¨</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåä¸º&nbsp;<code><span>DocNETExercises</span></code><span>&nbsp;çš„.NET 9 æ§åˆ¶å°åº”ç”¨ï¼š</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015710958-2096936063.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>Docnet.Core NuGetåŒ…å®‰è£…</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>åœ¨ NuGet åŒ…ç®¡ç†å™¨ä¸­æœç´¢&nbsp;<code><span>Docnet.Core</span></code><span>&nbsp;å®‰è£…ï¼š</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015731037-1855852402.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è·å– PDF æ–‡ä»¶é¡µç å’Œç‰ˆæœ¬</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// è·å– PDF æ–‡ä»¶é¡µç å’Œç‰ˆæœ¬<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;GetPDFPageCountAndVersion<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var getPageCount = docReader.GetPageCount();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var getPdfVersion = docReader.GetPdfVersion();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"PageCountï¼š{getPageCount}ï¼ŒPdfVersionï¼š{getPdfVersion}"<span>);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015747432-1222674339.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è·å– PDF æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// è·å– PDF æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;GetPDFText<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var pageReader = docReader.GetPageReader(0); //æ³¨æ„pageIndexä»0å¼€å§‹<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // è·å–æŒ‡å®šé¡µé¢çš„æ–‡æœ¬ï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†ç¼–ç ï¼‰<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; string pageText = pageReader.GetText();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine(pageText);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015806894-1448474410.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å°† JPEG å›¾ç‰‡è½¬æ¢ä¸º PDF æ–‡ä»¶</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// å°† JPEG å›¾ç‰‡è½¬æ¢ä¸º PDF æ–‡ä»¶<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;JPEGImageConvertToPDF<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var file = new JpegImage<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Bytes = File.ReadAllBytes("Assets/image1.jpeg"<span>),<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Width = 580,<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Height = 387<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var bytes = _docNetInstance.JpegToPdf(new[] { file });<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; File.WriteAllBytes("Assets/output_file.pdf"<span>, bytes);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015825143-690259993.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å°† PDF æ–‡ä»¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå›¾ç‰‡</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31aDEPhVgMsJ67kYMX8c6VgGRMtTxl2iba9Ziav4ticTar9ibgVgl7MjXWV53SFOZv4vpziafZSicK5Dmicx/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// å°† PDF æ–‡ä»¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå›¾ç‰‡<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /// &lt;/summary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static void&nbsp;PDFConvertToImage<span>()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var docReader = _docNetInstance.GetDocReader(FilePath, new PageDimensions(1080, 1920));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; //æŒ‡å®šç¬¬ä¸€é¡µ<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var pageReader = docReader.GetPageReader(0);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rawBytes = pageReader.GetImage();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var width = pageReader.GetPageWidth();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var height = pageReader.GetPageHeight();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var characters = pageReader.GetCharacters();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var bmp = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; AddBytes(bmp, rawBytes);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; DrawRectangles(bmp, characters);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var stream = new MemoryStream();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; bmp.Save(stream, ImageFormat.Png);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; File.WriteAllBytes("Assets/output_image.png"<span>, stream.ToArray());<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; private static void AddBytes(Bitmap bmp, byte[] rawBytes)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var bmpData = bmp.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var pNative = bmpData.Scan0;<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Marshal.Copy(rawBytes, 0, pNative, rawBytes.Length);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; bmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; private static void DrawRectangles(Bitmap bmp, IEnumerable&lt;Character&gt; characters)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var pen = new Pen(Color.Red);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; using var graphics = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; foreach (var c&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;characters)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var rect = new Rectangle(c.Box.Left, c.Box.Top, c.Box.Right - c.Box.Left, c.Box.Bottom - c.Box.Top);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; graphics.DrawRectangle(pen, rect);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250721015846360-1099508185.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®æºç åœ°å€</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æ›´å¤šé¡¹ç›®å®ç”¨åŠŸèƒ½å’Œç‰¹æ€§æ¬¢è¿å‰å¾€é¡¹ç›®å¼€æºåœ°å€æŸ¥çœ‹ğŸ‘€ï¼Œåˆ«å¿˜äº†ç»™é¡¹ç›®ä¸€ä¸ªStaræ”¯æŒğŸ’–ã€‚</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHubå¼€æºåœ°å€ï¼š</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/GowenGit/docnet" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/GowenGit/docnet</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>æœ¬æ–‡ç¤ºä¾‹æºç åœ°å€ï¼š</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/DocNETExercises" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/DocNETExercises</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å·²æ”¶å½•åˆ°C#/.NET/.NET Coreä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰ä¸­ï¼Œå…³æ³¨ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰èƒ½è®©ä½ åŠæ—¶äº†è§£C#ã€.NETå’Œ.NET Coreé¢†åŸŸçš„æœ€æ–°åŠ¨æ€å’Œæœ€ä½³å®è·µï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡å’Œè´¨é‡ã€‚å‘å·²æŒ–ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿å¤§å®¶è¸Šè·ƒæäº¤PRæ¨èæˆ–è‡ªèï¼ˆ<strong>è®©ä¼˜ç§€çš„é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ä¸è¢«åŸ‹æ²¡ğŸ¤</strong><span>ï¼‰ã€‚</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">

<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">ä½œè€…åç§°ï¼š</span><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank">è¿½é€æ—¶å…‰è€…</a></p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">ä½œè€…ç®€ä»‹ï¼š</span>ä¸€ä¸ªçƒ­çˆ±ç¼–ç¨‹ã€å–„äºåˆ†äº«ã€å–œæ¬¢å­¦ä¹ ã€æ¢ç´¢ã€å°è¯•æ–°äº‹ç‰©å’Œæ–°æŠ€æœ¯çš„å…¨æ ˆè½¯ä»¶å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆã€‚</p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;">
æœ¬æ–‡ç‰ˆæƒå½’ä½œè€…å’Œåšå®¢å›­å…±æœ‰ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è½¬è½½ï¼Œä½†æœªç»ä½œè€…åŒæ„å¿…é¡»ä¿ç•™æ­¤æ®µå£°æ˜ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢æ˜æ˜¾ä½ç½®ç»™å‡ºåŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¿ç•™è¿½ç©¶æ³•å¾‹è´£ä»»çš„æƒåˆ©ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹ä¸€ä¸‹å³ä¸‹è§’çš„<a onclick="votePost(cb_entryId,'Digg')" href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red;">ã€â™¥æ¨èâ™¥ã€‘</a>ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›èƒ½å¤ŸæŒç»­çš„ä¸ºå¤§å®¶å¸¦æ¥å¥½çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨æè¿°ä¸æ­£ç¡®çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æŒ‡æ­£æˆ–è¡¥å……ï¼Œä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ã€‚
</p>
